Section Header: CO-MORBIDITIES AND RISK FACTORS (existing prior to admission and ongoing)
Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has chronic cardiovascular disease, specified as a disease of the heart or blood vessels, such as coronary heart disease, stroke, peripheral arterial disease and aortic disease caused by a blood clot (thrombosis), or a build up of fatty deposits inside an artery, leading to the artery hardening and narrowing (artherosclerosis). This can reduce the blood flow to the heart, brain or body at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.
Metathesaurus Concept Code: C1290380, Chronic disease/disorder of cardiovascular system

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has hypertension, specified as a bloodpressure of 140/90 mmHg or higher at the specified time (WHO factsheet).
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, specified as chronic bronchitis, emphysema, chronic obstructive airways disease at the specific time
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has asthma specified as a chronic respiratory disease manifested as difficulty breathing due to the narrowing of bronchial passageways at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.

Definition: An indication of a disorder characterized by gradual and usually permanent loss of kidney function resulting in renal failure at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has obesity specified as having a high amount of body fat (body mass index [BMI] of 30 or more) at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has severe liver disease specified as cirrhosis and portal hypertension with variceal bleeding, ascites, chronic jaundice, or status post liver transplantation at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.
Standardized Term Code: 197270009, Acute hepatic failure, There is no mild, moderate or severe liver disease; only acute liver disease
Metathesaurus Concept Code: CL1680096, Moderate or severe liver or renal disease

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has mild liver disease specified as Chronic hepatitis or cirrhosis without portal hypertension at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had an asplenia or has been born without a spleen specified as an anatomic absence of the spleen or functional asplenia secondary to a variety of disease at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.
Metathesaurus Concept Code: CL534652, asplenia following surgical procedure; C3810472, Congenital absence of spleen

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has a common neurological disorder, specified as Alzheimer's disease, Parkinson's disease, Dystonia, ALS, Huntington's disease, Neuromuscular disease, Multiple sclerosis and Epilepsy at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has a malignant neoplasm specified as carcinomas, Hodgkin and non-Hodgkin lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has disorders of the blood and blood forming organs, specified as blood cell cancers, rere genetic disorders, anaemia, conditions related to HIV, sickle cell disease, complications from chemotherapy or transfusions at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.
Metathesaurus Concept Code: C1275398, Chronic disease of haematopoietic system

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has rheumatic disorders specified as osteoarthritis and rheumatoid arthritis at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, YES-on ART | 2, YES-not on ART | 3, No | 4, Unknown
Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has Human Immunodeficiency Virus 1 or 2 or has/had Aquired Immunity Deficiency Syndrome specified as a chronic, potentially life threatening condition that is caused by human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection, and is characterized by increased susceptibility to opportunistic infections, certain cancers and neurologic disorders at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.
Standardized Term Code: 62479008, Acquired immune deficiency syndrome; 19030005, Human immunodeficiency virus
Metathesaurus Concept Code: C0001175, Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome; C0019704 Human Immunodeficiency Virus 1; C0019707 Human Immunodeficiency Virus 2

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has a metabolic disorder characterized by abnormally high blood sugar levels due to diminished production of insulin or insulin resistance/desensitization at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has dementia, specified as a loss of intellectual abilities interfering with an individual's social and occupational functions. Causes include Alzheimer's disease, brain injuries, brain tumors, and vascular disorders at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has tuberculosis, specified as a chronic, recurrent infection caused by the bacterium Mycobacterium tuberculosis at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has malnutrition, specified as inadequate nutrition resulting from poor diet, malabsorption, or abnormal nutrient distribution at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Current smoker | 2, Never smoked | 3, Former smoke | 4, Unknown
Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has smoked, specified as the act of puffing and/or inhaling the combustion products of a substance so as to be tasted and absorbed into the bloodstream at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has Hepatitis B or C at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.
Standardized Term Code: 61977001, Chronic type B viral hepatitis, 128302006, Chronic hepatitis C
Metathesaurus Concept Code: C0524909, chronic type B viral hepatitis; C0524910, chronic hepatitis C

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has (chronic?) liver disease, specified as Hepatic necrosis, inflammation, or scarring due to any cause that persists for more than 6 months. Manifestations may include signs and symptoms of cholestasis, portal hypertension, and/or abnormal liver function tests at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: COMORBIDITITES: Please record if any of these comorbidities existed prior to admission.
Standardized Term Code: 235856003, Disorder of liver; 328383001, Chronic liver disease

Section Header: SIGNS AND SYMPTOMS ON ADMISSION  (first data, within 24 hours of presentation/admission)
Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has a history of flu-like symptoms specified as fever, chills and/or rigors at the specified time.
Completion Guideline: SIGNS AND SYMPTOMS: Please record if any of these signs and symptoms existed prior to admission.

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, YES - non-productive | 2, YES - productive | 3, YES - with haemoptysis | 4, NO | 5, Unknown

Section Header: COMPLICATIONS: At any time during hospitalisation did the patient experience
Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has viral pneumonia/pneumonitis, specified as inflammation of the lung parenchyma that is caused by a viral infection at the specified time.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has acute respiratory distress specified as an abrupt onset of signs or symptoms indicating difficulty breathing including alterations in breath sounds and rate, chest retractions and color changes at the specified time.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has a pneumothorax, specified as an abnormal presence of air in the pleural cavity at the specified time.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has pleural effusion, specified as increased amounts of fluid within the pleural cavity with symptoms include shortness of breath, cough, and chest pain at the specified time.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has an cryptogenic Organising Pneumonia (COP), specified as a rapidly developing inflammatory lung disease characterized by flu-like symptoms including cough, fever, malaise, fatigue and weight loss at the specified time.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has bronchiolitis, specified as inflammation of the bronchioles characterized by swelling of the bronchioles and mucus accumulation at the specified time.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has a cardiac arrest, specified as a sudden cessation (lack off) of cardiac activity in an individual who becomes unresponsive, without normal breathing and no signs of circulation at the specified time.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has myocardial infarction, specified as a gross necrosis of the myocardium, as a result of interruption of the blood supply to the area, as in coronary thrombosis at the specified time.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has cardiac ischaemia, specified as a disorder of cardiac function caused by insufficient blood flow to the muscle tissue of the heart at the specified time.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has cardiac arrhythmia, specified as an abnormal heart rhythm at the specified time.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has endocarditis, specified as an inflammation of the endocardium, the inner layer of the heart, which usually involves the heart valves at the specified time.

Definition: An indication whether the patient had/has a stroke or cerebrovascular accident, specified as a sudden loss of neurological function secondary to hemorrhage or ischemia in the brain parenchyma due to a vascular event  at the specified time.
